Package gameplay

Class SiedlerVonCatan

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.SiedlerVonCatan

  • public class SiedlerVonCatan
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates the entire game "Siedler Von Catan" Creates dices, a game area, the game objects and everything needed for the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      boolean gameFinished
      True if the game finished
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> playersWhoRejectedTrade
      list which saves for every trade how many players already rejected it
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> playersWhoRejectedTradeRightAway
      list which saves for every trade how many players already rejected it right away (decline button)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SiedlerVonCatan​()
      Class constructor which creates the game objects we need for the game.

      • noMoreStreetSpace

        public boolean noMoreStreetSpace​(Street firstRoadBuildingCardStreet)
        method used to check whether there is still place to build a street - in case a player who plays out a roadbuilding card only has place on the map for one more street (instead of 2)
        Parameters:
        firstRoadBuildingCardStreet - the first chosen street (it is possible the first street creates the only possibility for the second street
        Returns:
        true if there is no more space for a street of this player
